name: Moon Runner (nichi13)
description: In the 3D platformer Moon Runner, the player must maneuver through a moving asteroid field with decreased gravity in order to make it to the space station! In the space station, enemies wait to attempt to destroy the player, and they must be avoided or destroyed. The player must collect keys for the doors to advance to the final room where victory awaits.  For this game, I created the 3D asteroids, the terrain textures, and wrote scripts to rotate asteroids. I also used the assets from MSU to create unique levels.
